roleset.name: make illegitimate
roleset.note: DELEGITIMIZE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Comparison to 'legitimize'. No VNcls. (from delegitimize.01-v)

example.name: from BOLT
example.text: because some have joined extremist groups does not de-legitmize the plight of an entire people .
example.arg: because some have joined extremist groups
the plight of an entire people
